modName: Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry - Chinese Translation
summary: This is the Chinese translated version of the original Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry  mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Skyrim School of Witchcraft and Wizardry  mod. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22937
All credit to the original author phenderix.

Introduction
For more information, please refer to the original mod, or read the Chinesized instruction.

Installation
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with phenderix, thank him for this great MOD!
If you like this MOD, please endorse the author and vote for it, thank you!

About our group
DRAGON SLAYER MOD TEAMâ„¢ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: dsmod@yahoo.cn
OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: phenderix
